title: Removal of 3,4-dichlorophenol from water utilizing ferrate(VI): Kinetic and mechanistic investigations, and effect of coexisting anions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00274A, Paper
Yiwen Luo, Qing Zheng, Zhiyong Luo, Shuqing Xiang, Mei Dai
3,4-dichlorophenol (3,4-DCP) has been detected in industrial and domestic effluents, posing adverse effects on human health. Herein, ferrate (Fe(VI)) oxidation of 3,4-DCP was systemically and comprehensively investigated by determining its...
